actions.description: {@atk ms} 4 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) thunder damage.
actions.name: Scroll Bash

actions.description: Thundering golden energy erupts around a creature the apprentice can see within 90 feet of it. The creature must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Construct has disadvantage on the saving throw.
actions.name: Reduce to Memory (Recharge 6)

actions.description:
The apprentice casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
At will: guidance, light

1/day each: comprehend languages, locate object, mage armor
actions.name: Spellcasting
